headline: Leidos (LDOS) Margin Expansion Reinforces Bullish Narratives on Profitability and Value
summary: Leidos Holdings (LDOS) delivered earnings growth of 16.9% over the past year, outpacing its five-year average growth of 13.7%. Net profit margin improved as well, reaching 8.1% from 7.4% last year, which shows a clear step up in profitability. Looking forward, analysts see annual earnings growth moderating to 3.62%, with revenue expected to grow by 2.7% per year. See our full analysis for Leidos Holdings. Now, let’s see how this latest set of earnings results compares with the stories and...
